Name: Venoshock
Move Description & Effects: Greater damage - if target is poisoned

Name: Taunt
Move Description & Effects: Negates - all but damaging moves for 3 turns

Name: Protect
Move Description & Effects: Negates - all moves; fails if used consecutively

Name: Roost
Move Description & Effects: Restores HP - Half of Max HP

Name: Safeguard
Move Description & Effects: Negates - all status moves for 5 turns

Name: Facade
Move Description & Effects: Greater damage - if user has status effect

Name: Rest
Move Description & Effects: Restores HP - Fully and sleeps for 2 turns

Name: Attract
Move Description & Effects: User - Attracts opposite gender, attacks less

Name: Thief
Move Description & Effects: User - Steals held item if not holding anything

Name: Round
Move Description & Effects: Greater damage - if others use same move

Name: Sky Drop
Move Description & Effects: 2 Turn Move - picks up target then drops it

Name: Acrobatics
Move Description & Effects: Greater damage - if target isn't holding item

Name: Payback
Move Description & Effects: Greater damage - if user moves after target

Name: Retaliate
Move Description & Effects: Greater damage - if used right after ally faints

Name: Gyro Ball
Move Description & Effects: Greater damage - if user is slower

Name: Dream Eater
Move Description & Effects: Restores HP - Half the damage inflicted

Name: Grass Knot
Move Description & Effects: Greater damage - if target is heavier

Name: Substitute
Move Description & Effects: User - Uses HP to make decoy

Name: Fly
Move Description & Effects: 2 Turn Move; Fly, then attacks; Travel
